report.title: A Pre-Trip Trip
report.author: DevilDoc
report.bodytext: Tomorrow is going to be my first vacation in years, and I finished packing a little early so why not indulge a tad, right? I put 30mg of 2C-T-2 in a gelcap, and swallowed the cap at noon. I havent had much luck with this substance in the past although, each time Ive tried it was from the same 1g I recently acquired from a lab out of the country. I have purchased other chemicals from them before, and have always been very happy with the quality of their products. /n /n T+ :60 - First signs - I get the familiar slight tingling in the back of my head, not completely unlike the feeling I get from DXM at first. This feeling quickly passes, though, and I just get cold (as is usual for me on this substance). /n /n T+ 2:00 - Start noticing slight trails, but conversation is completely normal. I really dont notice anything at this point other than still being cold. /n /n T+ 3:10 - Now things are getting interesting. I just felt a little rush, which always reminds me of tryptamine rush, but not as intense. With tryptamines I know that there is more to come and it sometimes freaks me out. But with this substance I feel OK like it just wants to let me know its there, but nothing else. /n /n T+ 3:33 White walls have color to them, and this screen seems to be shimmering in a spectacular way. Thought process doesnt seem affected, but I can feel a definite change of consciousness. Concentration is a little skewed, and Im having difficulty focusing on my typing. /n /n T+ 5:00 Spent the last hour and change listening to music and watching TV. Music isnt really enhanced, and I dont feel especially drawn into drama on TV. The color shifting and image trails are nice, though. All thats really noteworthy is the off kilter feeling; that feeling of not knowing what is different, but knowing I'm definitely not straight. Having those usual paranoid thoughts of what ifs what if I never come out of it how would I go through life like this. Not nearly as pronounced as oral 5-meo-DMT experience (with Syrian Rue), but still there. /n /n T+ 6:30 Coming down completely it happens pretty quickly for me on this stuff. The trails are stopping, colors arent shimmering, and the mental effects are disappearing. /n /n T+ 7:30 Down almost completely. Some residual visual changes, but other than that I am almost back to baseline. /n /n T+ 8:00 Back to baseline, more or less. I do feel a little spacey, but just a tad this feeling usually lingers for a while after dosing with 2c-t-2 for me. A headache is moving in, as usual. They usually last half a day after for me. /n /n Summary: /n Another successful 2c-t-2 trip, but the highest dosage Ive tried yet. The shift in consciousness was more pronounced, and was accompanied by a little confusion and scatter mindedness at this dosage. 2c-t-2 is not my favorite chemical its effects dont impress me much, dont leave me in a productive state of mind, and it leaves me with a pretty bad headache. As always I am reminded how great weed is, and that I think Ill stick to it for a while to come. After my vacation its back to my dealer :-) /n /n Safe travels, all.
